Summary: bright light 10-20,000 feet in sky, then a cone shinning from the sky downward dissapated to fuzzy light dancing
divs: sighting detailsmy mother and i arrive in wellfleet for a weeks vacation. sitting outside looking west \ north west at the water having a glass of wine. the sun has set the stars are out there is not a cloud in the sky. she looks up towards west \ nw and says 'what is that'. there is a bright ball of light that opens from a ball into a light shinning from above downwards toward land in a cone shape,(it didn't shine to earth but half way towards the bay - but not reflecting on teh water etc) it then seems to close as if the 2 sides of the cone come together and it leaves a image of light which looks like it's soft muted in the shape of a image of a ghost a kid would draw in kindergarten, with a head, marshmellow arms, and a bell skirt. it sways from left to right for about 4-5 minutes until it completely disapates. i was in awe, and wonder, mom was very frightened. i called the local police who said they'd had a call, but there was a light show - and then they just said thank you for your call. this light didn't come from the earth up, it came from above down - and the light only showed down from the source, not above it. additionally, we are in a bay with no one else or sounds around us and we didn't hear any sounds or noises at all of any kind what so ever. we called a friend who's a colonel in the marines but couldn't get through and we called my sister. this is a first for either of us and would love to hear if anyone else saw anything similar!
